Package growthbook.sdk.java.models

Class GBContext

java.lang.Object
growthbook.sdk.java.models.GBContext
public class GBContext extends Object
Context object passed into the GrowthBook constructor. The builder() is recommended for constructing a Context. Alternatively, you can use the static create(String, String, Boolean, Boolean, String, Map, TrackingCallback) method.

  • Constructor Details

      public GBContext()

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static GBContext create(@Nullable String attributesJson, @Nullable String featuresJson, @Nullable Boolean isEnabled, Boolean isQaMode, @Nullable String url, @Nullable Map<String,Integer> forcedVariationsMap, @Nullable TrackingCallback trackingCallback)
      The GBContext.GBContextBuilder is recommended for constructing a Context. Alternatively, you can use this static method instead of the builder.
      Parameters:
      attributesJson - User attributes as JSON string
      featuresJson - Features response as JSON string
      isEnabled - Whether globally all experiments are enabled. Defaults to true.
      isQaMode - If true, random assignment is disabled and only explicitly forced variations are used.
      url - A URL string
      forcedVariationsMap - Force specific experiments to always assign a specific variation (used for QA)
      trackingCallback - A function that takes Experiment and ExperimentResult as arguments.
      Returns:
      created context

    • setAttributesJson

      public void setAttributesJson(String attributesJson)
      You can update the attributes JSON with new user attributes to evaluate against.
      Parameters:
      attributesJson - updated user attributes

    • setFeaturesJson

      public void setFeaturesJson(String featuresJson)
      You can update the features JSON with new features to evaluate against.
      Parameters:
      featuresJson - updated features

    • builder

      public static GBContext.GBContextBuilder builder()
      The builder class to help create a context. You can use this or create(String, String, Boolean, Boolean, String, Map, TrackingCallback) to create a GBContext
      Returns:
      GBContext.CustomGBContextBuilder
